channel.title: Inspiration on Lulliter
channel.description: Recent content in Inspiration on Lulliter

item.title: Wise Words | Perle di saggezza
item.description: 23rd of June 2019 you should choose to enter by the small rivers, and not go right away into the sea, because you should move from easy things to difficult things. (Letter of St. Thomas Aquinas to Brother John on How to Study) 1st of March 2019 Apri la mente a quel ch’io ti paleso e fermalvi entro; ché non fa scïenza, sanza lo ritenere, avere inteso.
